brief.content-text:
Diagram 2, Animation

The diagram is the same as Diagram 1. This animation depicts a request to remote ISP2 web server. The packet is sent from the user to the ISP1 POP router. The POP router sends the request to the NOC router of ISP1. The NOC router of ISP1 sends the request to the local router of ISP2 over the Internet.The local router of ISP2 sends the request to the NOC router of ISP2. The NOC router of ISP2 sends the request to the web server. The web server passes the requested information back down the chain to the user.
